ygData.subject: Need a Tinker!
ygData.msgSnippet: I m looking for a tinker on xegony, could any please mail me at Arturum@neteze.com I have several items I need made and am looking also for a tinkering mentor
ygData.messageBody:
I'm looking for a tinker on xegony, could any please mail me at
Arturum@... I have several items I need made and am looking also for
a tinkering mentor for a lower lvl gnome I have. Thank you,
Arturum
Order of the Jade Dragon
Web Master The Bilge Hunter
http://www.tahoebasin.com/jadedragon/Jade2/Bilgehunter.htm

From: <Yigman008@...>

Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] problems
